products.title: Smart Mug 2
products.description: Temperature-controlled smart mug to keep your drinks at the perfect temperature.

products.title: Travel Mug
products.description: Smart travel mug with a longer-lasting battery for coffee and tea lovers on the go.

products.title: Thermal Cup
products.description: Simple thermal cup for maintaining the perfect drink temperature without smart features.

products.title: Ember Cube
products.description: Self-refrigerated smart shipping container for healthcare applications.

products.title: Coffee Maker Bundle

products.title: Smart Plate
products.description: Temperature-controlled smart plate for keeping meals warm.

products.title: Wireless Charger
products.description: Wireless charger compatible with all Ember smart devices.

products.title: Ember Thermo Bag
products.description: Smart insulated bag to keep food at an optimal temperature during transport.

products.title: Smart Thermometer
products.description: Bluetooth thermometer for real-time temperature monitoring.

products.title: Bluetooth Kettle
products.description: Smart kettle with Bluetooth control to set precise water temperatures.

bundles.title: Ember Drinkware Bundle

bundles.title: Ember Healthcare Bundle
